body:
go get golang.org/x/tour/gotour

i just did that again a few days ago.

On 2/1/16, Andrew Gerrand <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> Are you running `go tool tour` to run the tour? Or `gotour`? If the latter,
> did you run `go get` to install `gotour`?
>
> ---
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14172#issuecomment-178225522
